replies.body: Just get a nice keyboard that feels good to use. I use a HP one though may upgrade to another. That said, I think 'gaming' keyboards are overpriced and are not much different to a normal keyboard.
replies.body_tagged: Just get a nice keyboard that feels good to use. I use a HP one though may upgrade to another. That said, I think 'gaming' keyboards are overpriced and are not much different to a normal keyboard.

There is no purpose to getting really expensive keyboards just for gaming. 
._.
